messages.title: A FRESH START
messages.content: KEEP SCOTLAND IN THE UK AND THE UK IN EUROPE.

messages.title: CHOOSE A FRESH START
messages.content: A BAD DEAL - The Conservatives want to force through an extreme Brexit that will wreck our economy. NO IDEA - Nobody knows where Labour stand on Brexit or Scottish independence. They keep changing their mind. They won't stop MORE CHAOS - The SNP want even more division with another independence referendum. They won't stop the division in our country.

messages.title: MAKE IT STOP
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will stop the division with a bold plan for a brighter future for Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe. A better, fairer society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Scottish Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
Support for investing in National Health Service and schools.
Commitment to addressing the climate emergency.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson, Labour leaders, Nicola Sturgeon

issues.economy: The Conservatives want to force through an extreme Brexit that will wreck our economy.
issues.environment: TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY - Commitment to addressing the climate emergency.
issues.health: INVEST IN OUR NHS - Support for investing in National Health Service.

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats are winning across the country

images.caption: Jo Swinson Leader of the Liberal Democrats.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet reflects the Liberal Democrats' stance on Brexit as a key issue, suggesting a tactical approach to oppose Brexit and keep Scotland in the UK, as well as the UK in Europe. Information on endorsements, complete contact details, the candidate's personal statement, their political experiences, and detailed key policies are not provided within the visible content of the leaflet.
